Package aom.scripting.ui.console

Class Campaign

Object
Campaign
public class Campaign
extends Object
This class provides a collection of Console commands concerning Campaigns.
Author:
Mythic_Freak - mythic.freak[a]gmail.com
Local Call
[@local Campaign commands are all local.]
Single Player Only
[@single Campaign commands are all intended for Single Player only.]

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void campaignAddScenario()
    Add a scenario to the campaign.
    void campaignAdvance()
    Advance to the next campaign.
    void campaignCreate()
    Create a new cpn/cpx file.
    void campaignDelScenario()
    Delete a scenario from the campaign.
    void campaignOuit()
    Quit the current campaign.
    void campaignPlayCurrent()
    Play the current campaign.
    void campaignResetCurScenario()
    Reset the current campaign scenario.
    void campaignResume()
    Resume the current campaign.
    void campaignSave()
    Save a campaign.
    void campaignSaveCurrent()
    Save the current campaign.
    void campaignSetHackyLoadScenarioMode​(int mode)
    Used by the UI.
    void campaignStart()
    Start a campaign.
    void showCampaignDialog​(string name, string msg)
    Shows a campaign dialog.
    void uiSaveCampaignGameBrowser()
    Loads the campaign game browser.
